Description:

Coordinating with Infra and Planning team, prepare a response/ NOC to customers.
Open and close the requests in Yardi - a property management system
Hold technical meeting with customers.
Provide customer service to clients, answering questions and resolving issuesSkills
Skills:
Bachelor's degree in Civil Engineering from an accredited university
3- 5 years of experience in civil engineering, with a focus on real estate development
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills
Must know the procedure of Authorities.
